data.name: Venusaur-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Frog Hop
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Poison Impact
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

data.name: M Venusaur-EX
rules: Mega Evolution rule: When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.
Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Bloom Buster
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Metapod
data.flavorText: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.

abilities.name: Adaptive Evolution
abilities.text: This Pokémon can evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.

attacks.name: Harden
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack's damage done to this Pokémon if that damage is 60 or less.

data.name: Caterpie
data.flavorText: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antennae on its head to drive away enemies.

abilities.name: Adaptive Evolution
abilities.text: This Pokémon can evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.

data.name: Butterfree
data.flavorText: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.

attacks.name: Quiver Dance
attacks.text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward. If you attached Energy in this way, heal 40 damage from this Pokémon.

data.name: Parasect
data.flavorText: The larger the mushroom on its back grows, the stronger the mushroom spores it scatters.

attacks.name: Colorful Spores
attacks.text: Choose 3 of your Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, search your deck for a different type of basic Energy card and attach it to that Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: X-Scissor
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

data.name: Paras
data.flavorText: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.

attacks.name: Blot
attacks.text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

data.name: Tangela
data.flavorText: It tangles any moving thing with its vines. Their subtle shaking is ticklish if you get ensnared.

attacks.name: Absorb
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

data.name: Pinsir
data.flavorText: It swings its long antlers wildly to attack. During cold periods, it hides deep in forests.

attacks.name: Overhead Throw
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Heavy Suplex
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Colorless in your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost.

data.name: Leafeon-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Leaf Blade
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Nature's Breath
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 30 more damage and heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

data.name: Charizard-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Flame Cloak
attacks.text: Attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Burning Breath
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

data.name: M Charizard-EX
rules: Mega Evolution rule: When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.
Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Heat Typhoon
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 50 more damage for each heads.

data.name: Ninetales-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Flare Bonus
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy card from your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.name: Ponyta
data.flavorText: As a newborn, it can barely stand. However, through galloping, its legs are made tougher and faster.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

data.name: Magmar
data.flavorText: Found near the mouth of a volcano. This fire-breather's body temperature is nearly 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.name: Rapidash
data.flavorText: Very competitive, this Pokémon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Overrun
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: M Blastoise-EX
rules: Mega Evolution rule: When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.
Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Dread Launcher
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.name: Blastoise-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Hyper Whirlpool
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hydro Press
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Shellder
data.flavorText: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

data.name: Cloyster
data.flavorText: Cloyster that live in seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.

attacks.name: Clamp Crush
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed and discard an Energy attached to that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spike Cannon
attacks.text: Flip 5 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

data.name: Krabby
data.flavorText: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.

data.name: Magikarp
data.flavorText: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.

attacks.name: Epic Splash
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

data.name: Gyarados
data.flavorText: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

attacks.name: Berserker Splash
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Aqua Tail
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

data.name: Vaporeon-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Bubble Drain
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Deep Squall
attacks.text: This attack does 130 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

data.name: Pikachu
data.flavorText: It raises its tail to check its surroundings. The tail is sometimes struck by lightning in this pose.

attacks.name: Nuzzle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

data.name: Articuno
data.flavorText: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

attacks.name: Find Ice
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Water Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

data.name: Raichu
data.flavorText: When its electricity builds, its muscles are stimulated, and it becomes more aggressive than usual.

attacks.name: Circle Circuit
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of Pokémon on your Bench.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.name: Jolteon-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Swift
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flash Ray
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic Pokémon.

data.name: Zapdos
data.flavorText: A legendary Pokémon that is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.

attacks.name: Raging Thunder
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Jolteon-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Swift
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flash Ray
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic Pokémon.

data.name: Golbat
data.flavorText: Once it bites, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

abilities.name: Sneaky Bite
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Swoop Across
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Zubat
data.flavorText: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from it mouth.

attacks.name: Skill Dive
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Slowpoke
data.flavorText: It is always vacantly lost in thought, but no one knows what it is thinking about. It is good at fishing with its tail.

attacks.name: Spacing Out
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scavenge
attacks.text: Discard a Psychic Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, put an Item card from your discard pile into your hand.

data.name: Haunter
data.flavorText: It licks with its gaseous tongue to steal the victim's life force. It lurks in darkness for prey.

abilities.name: Gothic Fear
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may leave both Active Pokémon Confused.

attacks.name: Poison Ring
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. That Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

data.name: Gastly
data.flavorText: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.

attacks.name: Sleep Poison
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

data.name: Gengar
data.flavorText: Hiding in people's shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.

attacks.name: Sinister Fog
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Creep Show
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has 3 or more damage counters on it, that Pokémon is Knocked Out.

data.name: Jynx
data.flavorText: It wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.

abilities.name: Victory Kiss
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may heal 10 damage from your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hug
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

data.name: Meowstic-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Shadow Ear
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mind Shock
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

data.name: Diglett
data.flavorText: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears aboveground.

attacks.name: Mine
attacks.text: Look at the top card of your opponent's deck. Then, you may have your opponent shuffle his or her deck.

data.name: Dugtrio
data.flavorText: In battle, it digs through the ground and strikes the unsuspecting foe from an unexpected direction.

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Rock Tumble
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

data.name: Machop
data.flavorText: It hefts a Graveler repeatedly to strengthen its entire body. It uses every type of martial arts.

data.name: Machoke
data.flavorText: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

data.name: Machamp
data.flavorText: Its four ruggedly developed arms can launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just two seconds.

abilities.name: Fighting Fury
abilities.text: Each of your Fighting Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Machamp Crush
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 40 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.name: Golem-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Megaton Fall
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 60 damage to itself.

data.name: Graveler
data.flavorText: With a free and uncaring nature, it doesn't mind if pieces break off while it rolls down mountains.

attacks.name: Double-Edge
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

data.name: Geodude
data.flavorText: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

attacks.name: Flail
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on this Pokémon.

data.name: Golem
data.flavorText: It tumbles down mountains, leaving grooves from peak to base. Stay clear of these grooves.

attacks.name: Stone Edge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Explosion
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 100 damage to itself.

data.name: Hitmonchan
data.flavorText: The arm-twisting punches it throws pulverize even concrete. It rests after three minutes of fighting.

attacks.name: Bullet Punch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

data.name: Hitmonlee
data.flavorText: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.

attacks.name: Stretch Kick
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Clefairy
data.flavorText: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.

attacks.name: Moonlight
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

data.name: Clefable
data.flavorText: Its hearing is so acute it can hear a pin drop over half a mile away. It lives on quiet mountains.

attacks.name: Follow Me
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Moonblast
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 30 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.name: Rhyhorn
data.flavorText: It is inept at turning because of its four short legs. It can only charge and run in one direction.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

data.name: Meowth
data.flavorText: Adores round objects. It wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

attacks.name: Exhausted Tackle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon. If tails, this Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

data.name: Mr. Mime
data.flavorText: It is adept at conning people. It is said to be able to create walls out of thin air by miming.

abilities.name: Bench Barrier
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to your Benched Pokémon by attacks.

attacks.name: Juggling
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

data.name: Persian
data.flavorText: Its lithe muscles allow it to walk without making a sound. It attacks in an instant.

attacks.name: Fake Out
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Ambush
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

data.name: Dodrio
data.flavorText: An odd species that is rarely found. The three heads respectively represent joy, sadness, and anger.

abilities.name: Retreat Aid
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, your Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost is ColorlessColorless less.

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

data.name: Snorlax
data.flavorText: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

abilities.name: Stir and Snooze
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is Asleep, flip 2 coins instead of 1 between turns. If either of them is tails, this Pokémon is still Asleep.

attacks.name: Sleepy Press
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon. This Pokémon is now Asleep.

data.name: Doduo
data.flavorText: The brains in its two heads appear to communicate emotions to each other with a telepathic power.

attacks.name: Double Stab
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Doduo Delivery
attacks.text: Draw 2 cards.

data.name: Tauros
data.flavorText: After heightening its will to fight by whipping itself with its three tails, it charges at full speed.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Seething Anger
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each damage counter on this Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

data.name: Clemont
rules: Search your deck for up to 4 Lightning Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Crushing Hammer
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Energy Switch
rules: Move a basic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Evosoda
rules: Search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use this card during your first turn or on a Pokémon that was put into play this turn.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Imakuni?
rules: Your Active Pokémon is now Confused.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Maintenance
rules: Shuffle 2 cards from your hand into your deck. (If you can't shuffle 2 cards into your deck, you can't play this card.) Then, draw a card.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Max Revive
rules: Put a Pokémon from your discard pile on top of your deck.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Olympia
rules: Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, heal 30 damage from the Pokémon you moved to your Bench.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Pokémon Center Lady
rules: Heal 60 damage and remove all Special Conditions from 1 of your Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Poké Ball
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Pokémon Fan Club
rules: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Revitalizer
rules: Put 2 Grass Pokémon from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Shauna
rules: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 5 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Red Card
rules: Your opponent shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck and draws 4 cards.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Team Flare Grunt
rules: Discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Team Flare Grunt
rules: Discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Double Colorless Energy
rules: Double Colorless Energy provides ColorlessColorless Energy.

data.name: Charmeleon
data.flavorText: My precious friend who is always with me. I have so many things I want to tell you.

attacks.name: Call for Support
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

data.name: Flareon-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Fire Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Blaze Ball
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.name: Chikorita
data.flavorText: Running around, climbing trees, playing hide-and-seek! Another wonderful day begins!

attacks.name: Run Around
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.name: Charizard
data.flavorText: No matter what happens, if we stick together, we can get past it. Forever and ever.

attacks.name: Recall
attacks.text: Choose 1 of this Pokémon's attacks from its previous Evolutions and use it as this attack.

attacks.name: Combustion Blast
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Combustion Blast during your next turn.

data.name: Shroomish
data.flavorText: I wonder if I would look a little cuter with a beautiful flower?

attacks.name: Worry Seed
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

data.name: Charmander
data.flavorText: My Charmander is so rambunctious! I wonder if we can become good friends?

attacks.name: Playful
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage times the number of damage counters on this Pokémon.

data.name: Snorunt
data.flavorText: What a delicious-looking snowman! I think I'll sneak a bite. It's OK…no one's looking, right?

data.name: Raichu
data.flavorText: The plan for today is to do nothing. My awesome tail is all curled up, and my ears are tired, too.

attacks.name: Circle Circuit
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of Pokémon on your Bench.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.name: Froslass
data.flavorText: Spring is already here, so goodbye…

abilities.name: Drag Along
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, flip a coin. If heads, the Attacking Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Snowy Drop
attacks.text: Put 4 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.

data.name: Dedenne
data.flavorText: Crackle…buzz…Dedenne…?! Beep…

attacks.name: Rest
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon. This Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Pachi
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

data.name: Jirachi
data.flavorText: The twinkle of the stars. The destiny of love. A miracle that grants wishes in the night sky.

attacks.name: Wish
attacks.text: Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

data.name: Wobbuffet
data.flavorText: When she's surrounded by cushions and dressers that I like, she looks just like a princess!

abilities.name: Bide Barricade
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, each Pokémon in play, in each player's hand, and in each player's discard pile has no Abilities (except for Psychic Pokémon).

attacks.name: Psychic Assault
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.name: Gulpin
data.flavorText: When Mom gets in the kitchen, the happiest things happen. I can feel my mouth watering!

attacks.name: Starvin'
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

data.name: Meowstic
data.flavorText: Intense silence. Two lamplights. Keep waiting for night to end.

attacks.name: Ear Influence
attacks.text: Move as many damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon as you like to any of your opponent's other Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: Does 10 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.name: Espurr
data.flavorText: My number one. Exceptionally cute. A little princess.

attacks.name: Twinkle
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

data.name: Yveltal
data.flavorText: Hidden away in its jet-black wings is a red passion.

attacks.name: Oblivion Wing
attacks.text: Attach a Darkness Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Darkness Blade
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

data.name: Flabébé
data.flavorText: It's OK. No one will take away your flower. You look cute even when you're angry.

data.name: Floette
data.flavorText: The five of us team up to be the Pretty Young Girl Force! We'll show you some beautiful moves!

attacks.name: Petal Blizzard
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Swirlix
data.flavorText: My fluffy heart makes me feel like a marshmallow. A thrilling macaron full of colorful magic. Everybody's crazy about the taste of candy! ☆

attacks.name: Lick Away
attacks.text: Remove all Special Conditions from this Pokémon.

data.name: Sylveon-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Dress Up
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Precious Ribbon
attacks.text: Move a Fairy Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, heal 50 damage from that Pokémon.

data.name: Slurpuff
data.flavorText: The cakes Slurpuff makes always look just like that one Pokémon it likes.

attacks.name: Lap Up
attacks.text: Draw 3 cards.

data.name: Floral Crown
rules: Attach a Pokémon Tool to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it.
At the end of your opponent's turn, heal 20 damage from the Basic Pokémon this card is attached to.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Diancie
data.flavorText: Open the magic door and a dream-colored party will start again today. I'll teach you the secret password.

attacks.name: Sparkle
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Diamond Storm
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Fairy Pokémon.

data.name: Altaria
data.flavorText: This fluffiness makes everyone go crazy. Is it really that charming?

attacks.name: Fairy Friend
attacks.text: If you have any Fairy Pokémon on your Bench, this attack does 30 more damage.

data.name: Swablu
data.flavorText: Wings and beaks. I like yours, and I like mine, too.

attacks.name: Bind Wound
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

data.name: Fletchling
data.flavorText: Little friends, thanks for always helping me look so cute!

attacks.name: Warble
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Fletchling, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

data.name: Sylveon-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Dress Up
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Precious Ribbon
attacks.text: Move a Fairy Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, heal 50 damage from that Pokémon.

data.name: Wally
rules: Search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-EX) and put it onto that Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward. You can use this card during your first turn or on a Pokémon that was put into play this turn.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Flareon-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Fire Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Blaze Ball
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.name: Pikachu
data.flavorText: A yellow body is proof of good health. If you touch its bright-red cheeks, you'll see its shining, smiling face!

attacks.name: Nuzzle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

data.name: Gardevoir-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Life Leap
attacks.text: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shining Wind
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon has no Weakness.

data.name: M Gardevoir-EX
rules: Mega Evolution rule: When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.
Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Brilliant Arrow
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage times the amount of Fairy Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.
